projects.name: Cthulhu Saves the World enhanced version for PC & XBox 360
projects.blurb: An enhanced PC and XBox 360 version of the parody RPG, Cthulhu Saves the World.

projects.name: Warring States
projects.blurb: Warring States is a strategy game for two playable in twenty minutes or less, set in the Japanese medieval period.

projects.name: KantCon 2011 Pre-Pre-Registration
projects.blurb: KantCon is a gaming convention for tabletop hobby gamers in the Kansas City area, created by tabletop hobby gamers in Kansas City area.

projects.name: CreaVures
projects.blurb: CreaVures is a platforming video game centered around 5 tiny mythical creatures. Help us launch by pre-ordering for your PC or Mac!

projects.name: Machination: A Game of Evil Genius
projects.blurb: Machination is a fast-paced and deviously fun robot-building game in development for the iPod,  iPad, and other mobile devices.

projects.name: We're Throwing a Scandinavian Indie Games Party!
projects.blurb: An indie games party in SF in honor of the wondrous work of Scandinavia? Yes, please. Free beer + Aquavit, a Swedish DJ, and much more.

projects.name: The Museum of Art and Digital Entertainment
projects.blurb: The MADE will be a fully interactive videogame museum in San Francisco, in the United States.  Help us secure a space.

projects.name: AZAMAR: The Role Playing Game, a Cinema6 Experience
projects.blurb: AZAMAR is an epic world that presents a unique experience. It uses the Cinema6 RPG Framework brought to you by Wicked North Games.

projects.name: ABC Letter Match, Childrens Collaborative Learning Game
projects.blurb: ABC Letter Match is a collaborative game where two children control their own mouse matching letters to pictures to solve a puzzle.

projects.name: Parefid's Tomb: An Internally Consistent Adventure Module
projects.blurb: Parefid's Tomb is a d20 adventure module released using the Open Gaming License.

projects.name: Grandroids: Real artificial life on your PC
projects.blurb: I'm creating the world's most advanced artificial creatures, for people to look after, interact with and study.

projects.name: Save Indie Game Site: GameTunnel.com
projects.blurb: GameTunnel was one of the first indie game review sites but 'died' in Sept 2009. The Indie Game Mag bought it & wants to bring it back.

projects.name: The Metagame by Local No.12
projects.blurb: The Metagame is a card game where you debate and argue about your favorite videogames.

creator.name: Colleen M, John S, & Eric Z

projects.name: Children of Liberty - Historical Stealth Platformer
projects.blurb: Children of Liberty is a stealth based platformer based on the hours leading up to the start of the American Revolutionary War.

projects.name: TaleTown: A Facebook Game for Readers
projects.blurb: TaleTown is a "choose your own adventure" style Facebook game where you customize your virtual home and win real e-book rewards!

projects.name: Providence: Rising Rebellion
projects.blurb: Bullet hell space shooter for Iphone and Droid with a free trial version online. Destroy the enemy invaders!

projects.name: Point of Descent
projects.blurb: A new take on the top-down shooter. Delve deep into the unknown, and try to drop your score as low as possible.

projects.name: Tweet Land - The first set of games that play with reality!
projects.blurb: Help us redifine real-time gaming! Tweet Land is the 1st set of games that play with reality, turning world's tweets into real stuff.

projects.name: GameSave Exhibition
projects.blurb:
A bunch of cool people made some videogames. We're going to use said videogames to save the world.

 But first, we're throwing a party.

projects.name: Dungeons: The Eye of Draconus
projects.blurb: Dungeons is a 2.5D retro brawler, reminiscent of classic arcade games like Golden Axe mixed with the humor of Conker's Bad Fur Day.
